property.name: LOW
property.shortdesc: Low.

property.name: DISCRETIONARY_LIGATURES_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Allows the use of optional discretionary ligatures.

property.name: FRACTIONS_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Reformats numbers separated by a slash, such as 1/2, as fractions. Note: In some fonts, the fractions feature reformats only standard fractions. For information on reformatting non-standard fractions such as 4/13, see denominator feature and numerator feature.

property.name: ORDINAL_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Superscripts the alpha characters in ordinal numbers.

property.name: SWASH_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Provides regular and contextual swashes, which may include alternate caps and end-of-word alternatives.

property.name: TITLING_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Activates alternative characters used for uppercase titles.

property.name: CONTEXTUAL_ALTERNATES_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Activates contextual ligatures and connecting alternates.

property.name: ALL_SMALL_CAPS_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Provides authentic small caps rather than scaled-down versions of the font's regular caps.

property.name: SUPERSCRIPT_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Sizes raised glyphs correctly relative to the surrounding characters.

property.name: SUBSCRIPT_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Sizes lowered glyphs correctly relative to the surrounding characters.

property.name: NUMERATOR_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: In a series of two numbers separated by a slash that form a non-standard fraction, such as 4/13, reformats the first number as a numerator.

property.name: DENOMINATOR_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: In a series of two numbers separated by a slash that form a non-standard fraction, such as 4/13, reformats the second number as a denominator.

property.name: TABULAR_LINING_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Gives full-height figures fixed, equal width.

property.name: PROPORTIONAL_OLDSTYLE_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Gives varying-height figures varying widths.

property.name: PROPORTIONAL_LINING_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Gives full-height figures varying widths.

property.name: TABULAR_OLDSTYLE_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Gives varying-height figures fixed, equal widths.

property.name: DEFAULT_FIGURE_STYLE_FEATURE
property.shortdesc: Applies the default figure style of the current font to figure glyphs.

property.name: OVERLAP_SWASH
property.shortdesc: Overlap swash

property.name: STYLISTIC_ALTERNATE
property.shortdesc: Stylistic alternate

property.name: JUSTIFICATION_ALTERNATE
property.shortdesc: Justification alternate

property.name: STRETCHED_ALTERNATE
property.shortdesc: Stretched alternate
